name: 20m
description:
20m (TWENTY METRES) - because 100m is too far to run!

A local-multiplayer athletics game for up to 8 players on one keyboard (or a mixture of keyboard and controllers)!

Inspired by classic joystick-breakers like Track & Field and Daley Thompson's Decathlon - the perfect game for furious local-multiplayer button mashing.

If you have no friends, that's no problem! 20m's competitive AI athletes provide a stiff challenge!

Features in v0.28:

  • HEATS! Single-player mode now involves semi-finals before the final
  • IMPROVED STATS: Record times, reactions and medal table
  • PBs! Personal best times recorded for all players.
  • 8-PLAYER local multiplayer
  • Optional AI opponents
  • Re-configurable controls (keyboard and/or gamepads, based on Input Dog)
  • IMPROVED BORING STUFF: Settings/preferences now saved to file
  • Endless replayability!

Default Keyboard Controls

  • Player 1: Left Arrow, Right Arrow (+ Enter or R_Ctrl to select)
  • Player 2: Z, X
  • Player 3: O, P
  • Player 4: Numpad Left, Numpad Right
  • Player 5: T, Y
  • Player 6: Q, W
  • Player 7: N, M
  • Player 8: Home, End

NEW: Use Left/Right (or equivalent), or PageUp/PageDown to cycle through usernames on name entry screen.

If a game pad is detected - it will control player 1 by default. A second detected gamepad will control player 2 - and so on.

Default Xbox 360 gamepad controls:

  • A, B (+ C to select)

Note - button prompts are currently only shown for the default controls.

How to Play

Once the starter's gun sounds - press your two buttons alternately as quickly as possible until you reach the finish line!

If you make a false start - you are disqualified from the race! You can re-join in the next round.
